com.netflix.genie.server.metrics
Class GenieNodeStatistics

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.genie.server.metrics.GenieNodeStatistics

public final class GenieNodeStatistics
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton class that implements all servo monitoring for Genie.

getNumInstanceJobs

@Monitor(name="Running_Jobs",
         type=GAUGE)
public int getNumInstanceJobs()
                       throws CloudServiceException
Get number of jobs running on this instance.

Returns:
number of running jobs
Throws:
CloudServiceException - if there is any error

         type=GAUGE)
